relation.text: wrote to you last , no better , these last two nights
months , as he has a great deal of strength still left
death ; & my Father has been much hurt . Our dear & amiable friend Anna Maria returns to Town to-morrow for the winter
now in a very fair way of being settled
applied to Mr Reveley last summer
had appointed him to be a brandy officer , with which William is very much pleas 'd . Once more my dearest friend Adieu . -- Miſs Glover Oct
